record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - September 26, 2008)

[Page: S9849]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Kelcy Paulson and Alicia Marie Johnson be granted the privilege of the floor for today's debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that during floor consideration of H.R. 2638 that Arex Avanni, a detailee to the Committee on Appropriations, be granted the privilege of the floor.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
